text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem wellbeing-concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pco/CodeSystem/wellbeing-concepts defines the following codes in a Is-A hierarchy:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1what-matters What MattersKnow and align care with each person's specific health outcome goals and care preferences including, but not limited to, end-of-life care, and across settings of care.
1mentation MentationPrevent, identify, treat, and manage dementia, depression, and delirium and other mental health conditions across settings of care.
1mobility MobilityEnsure that person can move safely every day in order to maintain function and do What Matters.
1medication MedicaionIf medication is necessary, use Age-Friendly medication that does not interfere with What Matters to the person, Mobility, or Mentation across settings of care.
1person-centered Person-CenteredGeneral category for person-centered goals and observations
1assessment-type Assessment Type
2  now-rating Now RatingWhere are you now?
2  now-reasons Now ReasonsWhat are the reasons you chose this number?
2  future-rating Future RatingWhere would you like to be?
2  future-changes Future ChangesWhat changes could you make to help you get there?

name: WellBeingConcepts
title: Well-Being Concepts
description: Code system to identify resource codes and category codes for Well-Being.

concept.definition: Know and align care with each person's specific health outcome goals and care preferences including, but not limited to, end-of-life care, and across settings of care.
Prevent, identify, treat, and manage dementia, depression, and delirium and other mental health conditions across settings of care.
Ensure that person can move safely every day in order to maintain function and do What Matters.
If medication is necessary, use Age-Friendly medication that does not interfere with What Matters to the person, Mobility, or Mentation across settings of care.
General category for person-centered goals and observations
What are the reasons you chose this number?
Where would you like to be?
What changes could you make to help you get there?
